DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study determine whether Feldenkrais method effective pain control , functional recovery quality life patient chronic low back pain comparing Back School program .
DOC.brief_title: Feldenkrais v Back School Treating Chronic Low Back Pain : Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Presence chronic nonspecific low back pain least three month ; Subjects age 18 80 year . Presence acute low back pain ; Low back pain due cause ( vertebral fracture , spondylolisthesis , herniated disc , lumbar canal stenosis ) ; CNS and/or PNS disorder ; Systemic inflammatory disease ( eg rheumatoid arthritis ) ; Systemic infectious disease ; Neoplastic disease ; Previous Surgery ; Cognitive impairment ; Pregnancy .
